ValidationRule.description: Checks to make both the Classification field is populated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
$Profile.Name <> $Label.API_data_Load_Profile &&
AND( not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "API" ), not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "Admin" ), AND (RecordType.Name='FalconConnect', ISBLANK(Text(Classification__c))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Classification field must be populated!
